text: hananim-eul wihae daesunlyewa sosunlyeleul haenghala hal su eobs-eul gyeong-u neun nega hal su issneun jemul-eul bachil geos-iyo geu jemul-i jedan-e oleulttae kkajineun meolileul kkagji malgeos-imyeo neo hoe gaunde mom-i apeugeona meolie sangcheoga iss-eulttaeneun meolileul kkag-ado doena dansig-eulosseo ttoneun gananhan ja deul-ege eumsig-eul jugeona hog-on jemul lo bacheog bosangtolog hala neohoega pyeong-anhal ttae hoemanghaneun janeun sosunlye lobuteo daesunlyekkaji gyesoghago hal su issneun jemul-eul bachyeoya doemyeo man-il geuleohge hal su eobs-eul gyeong-uneun sunlyegi gan jung sam-ilgan-eul dansighago jib-e dol awa ilgobnal-eul dansighayeo yeonheul-eul chaewoya hani igeos-eun seong-yeogbakk-e iss neun salamdeul-eul wihan geos-ila geuligo hananim-eul gong-gyeonghago hananim-ui beol-i eomhasim-eul alla
